long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evidence Locker Is a Chrome Extension designed to help people cite research (evidence), and allowing them to focus more on the actual research.  Simply highlight the text that you want to text, open the extension and press "Create Card" to cite the evidence.  It includes the option to save to different categories and has built in storage so you can finish all your research then copy and paste them wherever they need to be.  Please visit: tm64715.github.io/start.html  for more information.
